title: My Pixel 2 totally butchers colors!! What to do? Isn't it supposed to be one of best phone cameras?
content: I tried using different apps, different lights, different color settings of the display but that's not the issue. I took two photos of same thing with my phone and my friends. Her shows real life colors while mine turned pinkish red into carrot orange... I bought phone for camera so what is this supposed to be...
